text: One of my computers seems to have an outdated view of the General repository, or similar issue. I recently had a package merged in, and my other computer found it just fine. How do I fix that?

elements.text: One of my computers seems to have an outdated view of the General repository, or similar issue. I recently had a package merged in, and my other computer found it just fine. How do I fix that?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
you can always just delete the general repository and re-add it

elements.text: you can always just delete the general repository and re-add it

text: I did that the other day and borked something so I'm hesitant... but I'll try. The "./julia/registries/General" directory, yes?

elements.text: I did that the other day and borked something so I'm hesitant... but I'll try. The "./julia/registries/General" directory, yes?

registry rm General
registry add General
